attributes.action: Create a UK Strategic Cryptocurrency Reserve
attributes.additional_details: By holding a reserve of cryptocurrencies, such as BTC & ETH, We could protect our fiscal sovereignty, especially in the face of volatile fiat markets or geopolitical instability. It could position the nation as a leader in adopting innovative financial technologies. Over time, as cryptocurrency adoption grows, this strategic reserve could appreciate significantly, providing a valuable asset base to fund public initiatives or stabilize the economy during crises.
attributes.background: A strategic cryptocurrency reserve could serve as a progressive economic tool for a government, offering a hedge against inflation and currency devaluation in an increasingly digital global economy.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action:

Establish a Strategic Digital Assets Reserve
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706344
